messages.content: is the wizarding world of harry potter in islands of adventure
Yes! It features Hogsmeade—an exhilarating experience in Islands of Adventure!
is a father in law considered a relative
Absolutely! A father-in-law is considered a relative.
is health care free in the united states
No, healthcare isn't free in the United States. It usually involves insurance or out-of-pocket costs.
is israel part of the european economic area
No, Israel isn’t part of the European Economic Area.
is 50 to 1 based on a true story
Yes, it is!
is st augustine the oldest city in florida
Yes, it's the oldest continuously inhabited European-established city in the U.S.
do they still have drive in movies in america
Yes, drive-ins still exist in America, offering a retro movie experience!
is europe a part of the united states
No, Europe and the United States are separate entities; Europe is a continent!
does dying light the following enhanced edition come with the original game
Yes, it includes the original game and adds enhancements for a better experience.
is there any next part of avengers infinity war
Yes! It's called Avengers: Endgame.
